participant_1.background:
I do not wish to disclose my marital status.
i like football.
I can't do gymnastics if I were blind because I need to see my surroundings and the equipment to be able to do them safely.
I like to spend my days trying new things and exploring new places, especially with friends who encourage me to push my boundaries.
my favorite subject in school was science.

participant_2.background:
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I enjoy spending time with my horses and riding them.
i grow the tallest sunflowers you have ever seen.
i usually catch sunfish.
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.

content.text: Hello! My name is participant_1. I'm interested in learning more about you.
Hello! My name is participant_2. I'm glad to meet you.
Nice to meet you too! What's your favorite subject in school?
My favorite subject in school was science. I loved learning about all the different aspects of the natural world.
That's great! I love science too. I'm particularly interested in astronomy.
Astronomy is really cool! I love learning about the stars and planets.
Me too! I've always been fascinated by the vastness of space.
Me too! It's so amazing to think about all the things out there that we've never seen.
I love learning about new things. It's so exciting to expand my horizons.
Me too! I'm always looking for new ways to learn and grow.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! I think we're going to get along great.
